text: avane (svalihine) yum avanre alukaleyum namukk ratriyil keannukalayanamennum pinnit avanre avakasiyeatâ€Œ, tanre alukalute nasattin nannal saksyam vahiccittilla, tirccayayum nannal satyam parayunnavarakunnu enn nam parayanamennum ninnal allahuvinre peril satyam ceyyanam enn avar tam'mil parannuraccu
